alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 9:28PM CDT until March 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WEBSTER...NORTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 927 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rogersville, or 9 miles east of Ozark, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Springfield, Ozark, Rogersville, Sparta, Fordland, Linden, Elkhead and Bruner. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
